phrasetype.phrase: Hide both Expired and Reversed Infractions

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase:
With this option you can hide expired and reversed infractions from the end user in their User CP and Profile page.

This option was added by the "Hide Expired Infractions" product. You can completely remove this option—if you want to show all infractions—by disabling or uninstalling the product.
